name: VR Escape Room: Office Escape
description:
Alone.

No one is there.

Need to escape.

You are trapped in an office with no possible means of escape! The door is locked, there are no windows, and no one is nearby. You must use your wit and knowledge to solve all the puzzles! Will you beat the clock and escape or succumb to failure? Enter the Virtual World and ESCAPE!

VR Escape Room: Office Escape was created using the Unity Game Engine and tested with the HTC Vive. This game is fully released, but will continue to undergo minor updates. Completed to fulfill requirements of an Undergraduate DET Program.

Credits:

Developers: Nevan Simone and Cole Spears

We appreciate your comments! Please be sure to leave a comment below if you enjoyed the escape room, any suggestions to the current game, and any additional ideas for levels or puzzles!
